title: Choose a Nickname
description: Pick any name. This is how your consultant will refer to you—no email, no photo, no real name required.

title: Match with a Consultant
description: The 7thSense AI will connect you with a licensed healthcare provider based on your needs—instantly and anonymously.

title: Begin Your Virtual Consultation
description: Secure video or chat consultation—your health concerns addressed from anywhere.

title: Receive Your Report & Prescriptions
description: Get a professional medical report and prescriptions sent straight to your private dashboard.
